content: यंतृ {%a%} [यम्-तृच्] {@--1@} Restraining, curbing, controlling. {@--2@} Guiding, directing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A director, governor, ruler. {@--2@} A driver (as of an elephant, carriage &c.); coachman, charioteer; यंता गजस्याभ्यपतद्गजस्थं <ls>R. 7. 37</ls>; अथ यंतारमादिश्य धुर्यान् विश्रामयेति सः <ls n="R.">1. 54.</ls> {@--3@} An elephantdriver or rider.
